action.name: Multiattack
entries: The champion makes three Longsword attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage if used with two hands.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The champion adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the champion must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
